mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_date, goods_sm, goods_img, goods_price, goods_state, goods_num, goods_min, supplier_id
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_date, goods_sm, goods_img, goods_price, goods_state, goods_num, goods_min, supplier_id) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

goods_id,
goods_name,
goods_date,
goods_sm,
goods_img,
goods_price,
goods_state,
goods_num,

mapper.update:
update goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_date = #{goodsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_sm = #{goodsSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_img = #{goodsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_min = #{goodsMin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_date = #{goodsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_sm = #{goodsSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_img = #{goodsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_min = #{goodsMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
